text: You remember this day? Our first meeting! 😊❤️. This photo have so many memories of that day. seating at marine drive, escaping from hotel when price is too for pavbhaji and eating outside😂. I bet you not forgot and will not forever...😊

This one is bit late. I guess almost after 1 year we met, we had dinner together, most importatly we took selfie together😁😊❤️. After so many ghosting and all one year passed and I showed up again but this time for ever as your best friend🤗🤗
You remember this? even I told you that day also... you looked damn hot in that shirt. I ever complimented any guy for his looks🤭 but I was not lying😉
This mastani yaar😍. you know right from kanjur station😊. and do you remberer which day? ...Yes exactly I visited your home for first time😌
Yaayy our waffle date🧇🧇😍. its boscoff waffle we had. and you challenged me to post first ever photo to insta story and I did😌😂
And this one. Green leaf restaurent. and day? ofcourse you stayed at my house for nightout...we had so much fun😉
Ahhhaaa... bike ride to malshej ghat😍. first trip together✌️. my personal fav pic.❤️💕
this day and ride and sicnic view😍.this is our first pic clicked together with full pose🤭. it was raining that day. firse chalen?
Hehehe.. Pune trip it is. actually we could have click more pics on this trip but anyways I am happy at least I have one😉. and btw you are not looking good in this😋
I know this is your fav spot. how our life passed we showing each other our weak and strong points, spots. stories and many... and this is one of them😊. had a great dinner.. VASHI..
This one is funny. and dont kill me for that😂. I am glad you are enjoying with me. you are the best company I am having currently. Thank you for that💕
Hii handsome😍. we dont have competation but you look🔥. me too 😉. and you know that very well. what a trip Alibuag..😍
Only we know struggle behind this ride. I am sure you will remember always. as much as trip I am going with you it is becoming best ever.😊
Why we are hanging out so much together? because we are besties na😊. I only remember kunafa from that day😂

yesss my first long drive as a driver and you were passenger prince😌. I know how scared you that day but thanks for trusting me and let me drive till destination. place is you what it is... Ambernath😊
Lo bhai hamne mumbai ke ganpati darshan bhi kar liye..🤭 kuch bhi baki nhi chodenge..😂 This is year is full of new experices of with you..

ye Haloo.. Garba night..😍 Sorry bro i dispointed you but I am not pro in Garba I just know basics of it😊. and Thanks for clicking cute picture of me❤️ you are great my Best Friend. Thanks for making my life amazing.😊💕
